text: This horse was a gift from Kislevite Nobles with outstanding debts to the Van de Kuypers. It is rumoured the drabes that decorate this fine horse alone cost over a fortune. Intended or not, it's a sight to be hold that inspires friendly troops.
The finest steed freshly imported to the City-State of Marienburg.
The finest steed freshly imported to the City-State of Marienburg.
The most impressive Nightmares are those reared on fresh blood. Such noble monstrosities are worthy mounts.
Hellsteeds are vicious. Vampires that dabble in the binding of beasts delight in breaking these wild creatures to their will.
As a shadow of vengeance rides the Sword of Solkan through the dark streets of Marienburg, some say his horse Phantom is the vengeful image of Solkan himself.
Goldilock is the personal companion of the Arch-Priest of Haeyndrik, it's rider is said to be forever lucky in his endeavors.
The finest steed freshly imported to the City-State of Marienburg.
Gifted by a rather mysterious trader, Kawaru is Egmond's personal guardian and longma.
For years the grisly murders that haunted the dockyards of Marienburg were ascribed to a figure nicknamed the Suiddock Beast. Mundvard's Pet terrorgheist.
The finest steed freshly imported to the City-State of Marienburg.
The altar prominently features Manann, bearing his trident and five-tined crown.
